titleStmt.title: Instructions to a son by Archibald, late Marquis of Argyle ; written in the time of his confinement.
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.

notesStmt.note: Caption title reads: "The Marquiss of Argyl's instructions to his son."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
